title: Pietist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Force a player to target another at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first target will perform their ability on the second.
- If your first target has a self-targeting ability or cannot visit, the second target will automatically use the first target's ability unless not applicable (i.e Medium)
- Every time you make a player target a player of their own faction, gain a Faith Point. When you have gained 3 Faith Points, the Saint will gain a Saint point.
